mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_goods_cate ( goods_cate_code, goods_cate_name, goods_cate_remark, cate_parent_code, is_delete, create_user, create_time, last_update_user, last_update_time, version ) values ( #{goodsCateCode}, #{goodsCateName}, #{goodsCateRemark}, #{cateParentCode}, #{isDelete}, #{createUser}, now(), #{lastUpdateUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select goods_cate_name as goodsCateName, goods_cate_remark as goodsCateRemark, version as version from t_sys_goods_cate where goods_cate_code = #{goodsCateCode}
select goods_cate_code as goodsCateCode, goods_cate_name as goodsCateName, version as version, cate_parent_code as cateParentCode from t_sys_goods_cate where is_delete = 0 and cate_parent_code = 0
select goods_cate_code as goodsCateCode, goods_cate_name as goodsCateName, version as version, cate_parent_code as cateParentCode from t_sys_goods_cate where is_delete = 0 and cate_parent_code != 0
mapper.update: update t_sys_goods_cate set is_delete = 1, version = version + 1, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser}, last_update_time = now() where version = #{version} and goods_cate_code = #{goodsCateCode}
